channel.title: Clients cache downloading to desktop?
channel.description: My clients cache is downloading to the desktop instead of the c:/ drive. because of that when i make it into a webclient its not working.. is there anyway i can make it dl to the correct spot?

item.title: Clients cache downloading to desktop?
item.dc:creator: @Gazascape Gazascape
item.description:
@Gazascape wrote:

If you got a 562 loading 602 client. Which I believe your using. Go to qs.java

Search For

private static boolean checkRevision()
And under it you should see a directory, Yours maybe something like this
C:\Users\"your-user"\Desktop

Change that to this

C:/.562_cache_32v4/cacheRevision.txt

Now search for

client.downloadCache

You should see something like this

client.downloadCache("http://"website-name", ".562Cachev4.zip","C:/"your directory", "562Cache");

Now where it says

"C:/"(your directory)", "562Cache");

Change whatever directory it is to this…

C:/.562_cache_32v4/

Now close and save the file, and open the file Class_t.java

You will see something like this

Class_x.a("C:/"("Your directory");

Change the directory to this

("C:/.562_cache_32v4/RevengeScapeCache/");

Now Save and compile and your done!! wohoo! :D.

(this only works if your client loads 602/608)

Read full topic
